mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pt_trainer_authentication( idx, cert_type, password ) VALUES ( #{idx}, #{certType}, #{password} )

INSERT INTO pt_trainer_info_basic( pt_trainer_idx, pt_trainer_name, affilated_center, approval_status, birth_day, el_das, gender, nick_name, phone_number, registered_date, approved_date ) VALUES ( #{idx}, #{ptTrainerName}, #{affilatedCenter}, #{approvalstatus}, #{brithDay}, #{elDas}, #{gender}, #{nickName}, #{phoneNumber}, now(), now()
)

INSERT INTO pt_trainer_info_details( pt_trainer_index, award_winning, introduction, qualification, work_experience ) VALUES ( 1, #{awardWinning}, #{introduction}, #{qualification}, #{workExperience} )

INSERT INTO pt_trainer_work_experience( pt_trainer_index, start, end, role, organization ) VALUES
( 1, #{item.startDate}, #{item.endDate}, #{item.role}, #{item.organization} )

INSERT INTO pt_trainer_award_winning( pt_trainer_index, competition, participation, year, award_winning ) VALUES
( 1, #{item.competition}, #{item.participation}, #{item.year}, #{item.awardWinning} )

INSERT INTO pt_trainer_qualitification( pt_trainer_index, license_name, organization, issued_date ) VALUES
( 1, #{item.licenseName}, #{item.issuedOrganization}, DATE_FORMAT(#{item.issuedDate}, '%y%m%d') )
INSERT INTO pt_trainer_center_approved( pt_trainer_idx, affilated_center, approval_status, approval_date ) VALUES ( #{idx}, #{affiliateCenter}, #{approvalStatus}, now() )
mapper.select: select pt.id, pt.last_access, auth.cert_type, info.pt_trainer_name, info.affilated_center, info.nick_name, info.phone_number, sib.store_name from pt_trainers pt left join pt_trainer_authentication auth on auth.idx = pt.idx left join pt_trainer_info_basic info on info.pt_trainer_idx = pt.idx left join stores st on st.idx = info.affilated_center left join stores_info_basic sib on st.idx = sib.store_idx where pt.idx = #{idx};
mapper.update: UPDATE pt_trainer_info_basic left join pt_trainers pt on pt.idx = pt_trainer_info_basic.pt_trainer_idx left join pt_trainer_authentication auth on auth.idx = pt.idx left join pt_trainer_info_basic info on info.pt_trainer_idx = pt.idx left join stores st on st.idx = info.affilated_center left join stores_info_basic sib on st.idx = sib.store_idx SET info.pt_trainer_name = #{ptTrainerName} WHERE pt.idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pt_fee_information( pt_trainer_idx, separate_paymentYN, notice, round_time ) VALUES ( 1, #{separatePaymentYN}, #{notice}, #{roundTime} )

INSERT INTO pt_use_price( pt_fee_information_idx, title, round ) VALUES
( ${item.idx}, #{item.title}, #{item.round} )

INSERT INTO pt_use_price_detail( use_price_idx, amount, round ) VALUES
( ${item.idx}, #{item.amount}, #{item.round} )

INSERT INTO product( name, product_type, price, discount, registered_date, discount_price, ongoing_sales, description, seller_idx ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{productType}, #{price}, #{discountRate}, now(), #{discountPrice}, 1, #{description}, 1 )
mapper.select: select * from pt_fee_information left join pt_use_price pup on pt_fee_information.idx = pup.pt_fee_information_idx left join pt_use_price_detail pupd on pup.idx = pupd.use_price_idx where pt_trainer_idx = #{idx};
